author: trackreco
body: - increase the number of preselected hits from 16 to 32: this helps in the [pixelLess](http://uaf-10.t2.ucsd.edu/~slava77/figs/mic/CMSSW_12_6_0_pre5-pixmkf/RelValTTbar_14TeV-PU_2022_realistic/mtv-ckf-pmkf-orig-max32-prune1st-3366d02/plots_pixelLessStep.html) and gives almost no effect in [default mkfit-5](http://uaf-10.t2.ucsd.edu/~slava77/figs/mic/CMSSW_12_6_0_pre5-pixmkf/RelValTTbar_14TeV-PU_2022_realistic/mtv-ckf-mkf5-orig-max32-prune1st-b778e2f/plots_ootb.html) - prune the first layer hits to contain only one hit that matches with the track candidate state (enabled only in the pixelLess) in pixelLess-only ckf.vs.mkfit: in mkfit-5 (current default) compared to all ckf: red (default) and black (this PR) are essentially the same I will keep this as a draft for now.
title: pixelLess efficiency recovery: maxhits 32, prune first hit
